selected_quotes: Next glaciation many tens of millennia away as Earth's orbit currently not very elliptical + high CO2 levels
This is sure to become a seminal
Past Interglacials (PIGS) WG synthesis paper, Interglacials of the last 800,000 years in Reviews of Geophysics
Interglacials : Now fully published and open access
Wolff: What is an interglacial... defined by sea level and LR04 = 11 interglacials / last 800 kyr #PAGES17 framework
